Attributes.description: Selected topics in the literature, ideas, and arts of the ancient Mediterranean, Near East and/or Egypt, with an emphasis on research. A maximum of 12 credits will be granted for AMNE 440 and CLST 402. Students should consult the AMNE Undergraduate Advisor before registering.
